description:
`FunnelChart` is used to visualize the progressive reduction of data as it passes
from one phase to another.

data.description: Array of data to be plotted.

x.description: Accessor function for X values, called once per datum, or a single value to be used for all datums.

y.description: Accessor function for Y values, called once per datum, or a single value to be used for all datums.

color.description:
Color applied to the path element,
or accessor function which returns a class.

Note that the first datum's color would not be applied since it fills in the area of the path

pathClassName.description:
Classname applied to each path element,
or accessor function which returns a class.

pathStyle.description:
Style applied to each path element,
or accessor function which returns a style object.

xScale.description: D3 scale for X axis - provided by XYPlot.

yScale.description: D3 scale for Y axis - provided by XYPlot.
